abstract: Victrelis, from Merck, is the first of a new generation of drugs that promise to increase the cure rate while shortening the treatment time.
snippet: Victrelis, from Merck, is the first of a new generation of drugs that promise to increase the cure rate while shortening the treatment time.
lead_paragraph: The Food and Drug Administration approved on Friday the first of a new generation of hepatitis C drugs that promises to increase the cure rate while shortening the time required for treatment.

headline.main: Merck’s Hepatitis C Drug Wins F.D.A. Approval
headline.print_headline: Merck’s Hepatitis C Drug Wins F.D.A. Approval
